text: Aakhir kiya waja hai kay tum aisay janwar mein say na khao jiss per Allah ka naam liya gaya ho halankay Allah ney unn sab janwaron ki tafseel bata di hai jin ko tum per haram kiya hai magar woh bhi jab tum ko sakht zaroorat parr jaye to halal hai aur yeh yaqeeni baat hai kay boht say aadmi apney khayalaat per bila kissi sanad kay gumrah kertay hain. Iss mein koi shuba nahi kay Allah Taalaa hadd say nikal janey walon ko khoob janta hai
